article.title: BAE to Enhance Electronic Warfare Family of Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information, Nashua, New Hampshire, was awarded a $14,180,000 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract modification to build upon the capabilities of Electronic Warfare Family of Systems Phase I for accelerated fielding and enhancement, through the development of Phase II. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Natick, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
